author: Nābulusī, ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl, 1641-1731
contents: 1. leaves 1b-50a: al-Maʻārif al-ghaybīyah sharḥ al-ʻAynīyah al-Jīlīyah.
2. leaves 50b-82a: al-Durrah al-muḍīʼah fī sharḥ al-Khamrīyah al-Fāriḍīyah.
3. leaves 82a-115a: Kashf al-sirr al-ghāmiḍ fī sharḥ Dīwān Ibn al-Fāriḍ.
4. leaves 115b-121b: Lumʻat al-nūr al-muḍīʼah fī sharḥ al-abyāt al-sabʻah al-Fāriḍīyah.
5. leaves 122a-127b: Radd al-muftarī ʻan al-ṭaʻn fī al-Shushtarī.
6. leaves 128a-140b: al-Kawkab al-mutalaʼliʼ sharḥ qaṣīdat al-Ghazzālī.
7. leaves 141a-159a: Nafkhat al-ṣūr wa-nafḥat al-zuhūr fī al-kalām ʻalá abyāt Qabḍat al-nūr.
8. leaves 159b-166b: Kawkab al-ṣubḥ fī izālat layl al-qubḥ.
9. leaves 167a-171b: Hadīyat al-faqīr wa-taḥīyat al-wazīr.
10. leaves 172b-190b: al-Fatḥ al-Madanī fī al-nafas al-Yamanī.
11. leaves 192a-199b: Anwār al-sulūk fī asrār al-mulūk.
12. leaves 200a-207b: al-Nafaḥāt al-muntasharah fī al-jawāb ʻan al-asʼilah al-ʻasharah.
13. leaves 208a-213a: al-Luʼluʼ al-maknūn fī ḥukm al-akhbār ʻammā sayakūn.
14. leaves 213b-216a: Taḥqīq al-dhawq wa-al-rashf fī maʻná al-mukhālafah al-wāqiʻah bayna ahl al-kashf.
15. leaves 216b-218a: Rafʻ al-ishtibāh ʻan ʻalamīyat ism Allāh.
16. leaves 218b-224b: Tanbīh man yalhū ʻalá ṣiḥḥat al-dhikr bi-al-ism "Huwa".
17. leaves 225b-268a: Miftāḥ al-futūḥ fī mishkāt al-jism wa-zajājat al-nafs wa-miṣbāḥ al-rūḥ.
18. leaves 268b-279a: Rawḍ al-anām fī bayān al-ijāzah fī al-manām.
19. leaves 279b-303b: al-Ṣirāṭ al-sawī sharḥ dībājat al-Mathnawī.
20. leaves 304a-309a: Ziyādat al-basṭah fī bayān "al-ʻilm nuqṭah".
21. leaves 309b-314b: Zubdat al-fāʼidah fī al-jawāb ʻan al-abyāt al-wāridah.
22. leaves 315a-319a: al-Sirr al-mukhtabī fī ḍarīḥ Ibn al-ʻArabī.
23. leaves 319b-322b: al-Ḥaqq al-yaqīn wa-hidāyat al-muttaqīn.
24. leaves 323a-325b: Basṭ al-dhirāʻayn bi-al-waṣīd fī bayān al-ḥaqīqah wa-al-majāz min al-tawḥīd.
25. leaves 326a-335a: al-Maqām al-asmā fī imtizāj al-asmāʼ.
26. leaves 335b-340b: al-Shams ʻalá Janāḥ al-ṭāʼir fī maqām al-wāqif al-sāʼir.
27. leaves 345b-353b: al-Kashf wa-al-bayān fīmā yataʻallaqu bi-al-nisyān.
creator: Nābulusī, ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl, 1641-1731
نابلسي، عبد الغني بن اسماعيل، 1641-1731
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
